main.subtitle: Hi! I'm
main.name: Rustem
main.description: Here you can get acquainted with my portfolio, view my projects, learn about me and my technology stack.

about.aboutDescription: My name is Rustem. I am from the Republic of Tatarstan - Russia, the city of Kazan. I started my career in IT from working as a freelance web designer, worked for about a year, got acquainted with the layout, liked it, started to get deeper, started to work, continued to work freelance, created a layout and made it up myself, continued to study every day, took jobs that were much more difficult, understood what I want to do and he switched completely to fronted, continued to work as a freelancer and began collaborating with several companies. There I developed large projects on react, such as online stores, blogs, multi-pages, landing pages and other projects
about.softSkills: Organization and planning of working hours, analytical thinking, the desire to learn and develop, communication skills, ability to work in a team, stress tolerance

notFound.descr: The page was not found, but there are more interesting pages
